CustomField.description: **System Calculated** Gateway supports credit transactions. A credit is like a void, except it actually reverses a charge instead of just canceling a charge that hasn’t yet been made.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** Gateway supports credit transactions. A credit is like a void, except it actually reverses a charge instead of just canceling a charge that hasn’t yet been made.
CustomField.label: Supports Credit
